abilities.name: ionian fervor
abilities.description: When Irelia strikes enemies with spells she gains stacking bonus Attack Speed. At maximum stacks she also gains bonus damage on hit.

abilities.name: bladesurge
abilities.description: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target, healing herself. If the target is Marked or dies to Bladesurge, its cooldown refreshes.

abilities.name: defiant dance
abilities.description: Irelia charges a strike that deals more damage as she charges. She takes reduced physical damage during the charge.

abilities.name: flawless duet
abilities.description: Irelia sends out two blades which converge on each other. Enemies caught in between are damaged, stunned and Marked.

abilities.name: vanguard's edge
abilities.description: Irelia fires a massive number of blades that explode outward upon hitting an enemy champion. Enemies hit by the blades are damaged and Marked. Afterwards the blades form a wall that will damage and slow enemies that walk through it.
